SELECT s.shipping_slip_seq, s.shipping_slip_name, s.shipping_slip_shipping_date, c.client_name, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(i.item_name SEPARATOR ", ") FROM tb_shipping_slip_item ssi JOIN tb_item i ON i.item_seq = ssi.item_seq WHERE s.shipping_slip_seq = ssi.shipping_slip_seq ) AS item_name FROM tb_shipping_slip s JOIN tb_shipping_instruction si ON (s.shipping_instruction_seq = si.shipping_instruction_seq) JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE s.shipping_slip_status IS NULL
AND #{request.startDate} <= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
AND #{request.endDate} >= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
AND c.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.clientName}, '%')
ORDER BY s.shipping_slip_reg_date DESC
LIMIT #{request.size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_shipping_slip s JOIN tb_shipping_instruction si ON (s.shipping_instruction_seq = si.shipping_instruction_seq) JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE s.shipping_slip_status IS NULL
AND #{request.startDate} <= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
AND #{request.endDate} >= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
AND c.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.clientName}, '%')

SELECT s.shipping_slip_seq, s.shipping_slip_name, s.shipping_slip_shipping_date, c.client_name, s.shipping_slip_total_quantity, s.shipping_slip_address AS shipping_address, u.user_name, s.shipping_slip_note FROM tb_shipping_slip s JOIN tb_user u ON (s.user_seq = u.user_seq) JOIN tb_shipping_instruction si ON (s.shipping_instruction_seq = si.shipping_instruction_seq) JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE s.shipping_slip_seq = #{shippingSlipSeq}

SELECT ssi.shipping_slip_item_seq, ssi.item_seq, i.item_image_url, i.item_name, i.item_division, i.item_price, ssi.shipping_slip_item_quantity, ssi.shipping_slip_item_note, (i.item_price * ssi.shipping_slip_item_quantity) AS itemTotalAmount FROM tb_shipping_slip_item ssi JOIN tb_item i ON ssi.item_seq = i.item_seq WHERE ssi.shipping_slip_seq = #{shippingSlipSeq}

SELECT s.shipping_slip_seq, s.shipping_slip_shipping_date, DATE_FORMAT(s.shipping_slip_shipping_date, '%Y/%m') shipping_slip_shipping_month_date, s.shipping_slip_name, FORMAT(s.shipping_slip_total_quantity, 0) shipping_slip_total_quantity, c.client_name, s.shipping_slip_address AS shipping_address, s.shipping_slip_note, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(s.shipping_slip_total_quantity), 0), 0) shipping_slip_total_quantity_sum FROM tb_shipping_slip s JOIN tb_shipping_instruction si ON (s.shipping_instruction_seq = si.shipping_instruction_seq) JOIN tb_sales_order so ON (si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq) JOIN tb_client c ON (so.client_seq = c.client_seq) WHERE s.shipping_slip_status IS NULL
AND #{request.startDate} <= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
AND #{request.endDate} >= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
AND c.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.clientName}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.shipping_slip_shipping_date, '%Y/%m'), s.shipping_slip_shipping_date WITH ROLLUP;

AND #{request.startDate} <= s.shipping_slip_shipping_date
